Text:
The episode has been renamed "In Memoriam". IMDb has yet to update their records.

From Wikipedia:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/In_Memoriam_(Homeland)

From Showtime's Homeland episode guide:
http://www.sho.com/sho/homeland/season/2/episode/11#/index
Showtime is the network that airs Homeland, so it doesn't get more official than that.

Thanks for the info. Too late now.

What a cool mistake I've made ... heh

AVIGUY
